column4: with any luck, after today, my laptop will be free of it's Windows XP infection :)
with a little help from the new version of Crossover Office anyway :)
blah! OpenOffice works just as well.
sure, as long as you're not going to school at ITT-Tech where their online courses are EXTREMELY picky about having IE, and MS Office.
problem 2 is I manage a windows network as my job, so some of the tools I just have to have.
good to know,  I didn't know the j switch.  well versed in xvfz  :)
the kernel headers installed don't match the one running!
frogzoo, yeah I gathered that,  Synaptic doesn't have a headers 2.6.12-9 option....   And this is for installing vmware, it needs to create a kernel module.
Seveas, frogzoo, soundray, Thank you all for your assistance in getting vmware up and running on my system.
unzip! Install it if you've not got it.
